hypothesis_content.title: Volatility Compression Breakout Regime Shift
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC 20-day realized volatility compresses below 30% while price consolidates within a 5% range for 14+ days during a NEUTRAL regime, the subsequent breakout direction (confirmed by >3% move outside range) will signal the next regime (BULL if up, BEAR if down) with 70% accuracy over the following 10 trading days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended low-volatility consolidation during neutral periods represents energy accumulation. The magnitude of compression creates asymmetric potential for directional regime shifts as pent-up supply/demand imbalances resolve.
entry_conditions: BTC price range (high-low)/low < 5% for 14 consecutive days
BTC price breaks consolidation range by >3%

exit_conditions.take_profit: 10% move in breakout direction from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout direction fails to predict 10-day regime classification (using FjordHQ's regime model) in >30% of historical instances since 2020.
